ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class RemoteObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.RemoteObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConcreteTestObject, Signal, Task, User

    public abstract class RemoteObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    RemoteObject is an abstract class for defining behaviors of objects that are uploaded to RemoteClients
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected RemoteObject()
      create the remoteObject with the current timestamp.
